mapper.insert: INSERT INTO parkdata (serialNo, spaceNo, carNo, enterType, enterDate, enterUser, discountCode, leaveType, leaveDate, leaveUser, spotCount, userRemark, spotNo, gasan, discAmount, cutAmount, saleAmount, receiveAmount, recpDt, gojiState, remark, insertUser, insertDate, insertIp, del_Tag, chasu) VALUES (#{serialNo}, #{spaceNo}, #{carNo}, 3, #{enterDate}, #{enterUser}, #{discountCode}, #{leaveType}, #{leaveDate}, #{leaveUser}, #{spotCount}, #{userRemark}, #{spotNo}, #{gasan}, #{discAmount}, #{cutAmount}, #{saleAmount}, #{receiveAmount}, #{recpDt}, #{gojiState}, #{remark}, #{insertUser}, now(), #{insertIp}, 0, #{chasu})
mapper.select: SELECT p.serialNo, s.spaceNm, p.spotNo, p.carNo, p.enterDate, p.enterUser, p.discountCode, p.leaveType, p.leaveDate, p.leaveUser, p.spotCount, p.userRemark, p.gasan, p.discAmount, p.cutAmount, p.saleAmount, p.receiveAmount, p.recpNo, p.recpDt, p.remark, p.accGubun, p.gojiState FROM parkdata p JOIN space_info s ON p.spaceNo = s.spaceNo WHERE p.serialNo = #{serialNo} AND p.del_Tag = '0'
